title: Fiskars Seam Ripper and Measuring Tape Set
description: The Fiskars® Seam Ripper and Measuring Tape Set includes two essentials for sewing accessories and supplies. The seam ripper quickly and safely removes lines of stitching, with an ergonomically shaped handle for comfort and control. Durable and flexible measuring tape is 5 ft. long, and it has an automatic retraction button for convenience.
